pages.name: Mantashark
pages.text: A ray-like creature found in the Mirrored Seas. Hostile to the player.

pages.name: Opalized Mantashark
pages.text: A ray-like creature found in the Mirrored Seas. Hostile to the player.$(br)Killing an Opalized Mantashark may get you an Opalized Tooth, useful in making Prismatic Shears.
